content.notice_type: Notice for Engagement on Contract Basis

post_details.name: Accountant
post_details.max_age: Retired persons up to 62 years as on 30-06-2024
post_details.ta_da: For official tour/visit, as per rules
post_details.contract_tenure: Initially one year; may extend up to 3 terms, total max 3 years
post_details.essential_qualification: Bachelor's degree in Commerce from a recognized University/Institute; proficiency in computer word processing & spreadsheets
post_details.desirable_qualification: English proficiency in speaking & writing; other computer skills
post_details.experience: Accounts-cum-administrative training; analogous posts in Central/State Govt./Autonomous bodies/ PSU/Central/State Universities for at least 5 years

application_procedure.submission_mode: Single PDF via email to establishment@nita.ac.in
application_procedure.documents_required: CV/application in prescribed format + self-attested certificates for proof of education/experience/age/caste
application_procedure.shortlisting: Shortlisted candidates informed via return email with tentative date & time of interview

terms_conditions: Appointment purely on contract basis for a fixed pay and duration; initially one year; may extend up to 3 terms, total max 3 years
Decision of Competent Authority of NIT Agartala is final & binding
One month's notice or salary in lieu required to leave during contract
Engagement may be discontinued without reason if service exigency or institute interest requires
If applications >10 for a vacancy, shortlisting criteria may be applied
Essential qualifications must be from recognized institutions
Competent Authority may relax/modify criteria for suitable candidates
Canvassing or outside influence leads to rejection
Director's decision final in case of disputes
copy_to: Registrar, Tripura University, Suryamaninagar, Amtali, West Tripura
